headline: Bank of America Announces Redemption of CAD550,000,000 3.515% Fixed/Floating Rate Senior Notes, Due March 2026
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., Feb. 20, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Bank of America Corporation announced today that it will redeem on March 24, 2025 all CAD550,000,000 principal amount outstanding of its 3.515%...
